column4: it's probably the cache for when you click the "back" button in firefox

yeah.  but you figure if it's caching 800MB, i'd have downloaded that much... i've got a 1Mb connection... there isn't time to get that much content.  so like i said, i haven't a clue what it's using that for.
memory leak caused by a poorly written extension?
i do have some third party plugins.  that's certainly possible.
